analysis: The project is a static website about black holes with a dark, cosmic theme. The current files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the main website, as well as additional configurations for deployment. The theme should be enhanced to focus on black holes, incorporating animated objects, slides, and pages. The existing CSS and JavaScript files need updates to ensure proper functionality and visual appeal.

improvements.description: Enhance the CSS to include a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Ensure the SVG data URLs are properly formatted for Egyptian-themed patterns.

Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.

Update the JavaScript to ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality. Fix any syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the mobile menu toggle functionality with smooth transitions and user-friendly interactions.
